title: 'Humanity at its worst' - Man Utd's Rashford racially abused on social media
description: Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford says he was subjected to "humanity and social media at its worst" after receiving racist abuse on Saturday night.

title: TikTok singer Amy Hawkins, 110, becomes viral sensation

description: Some Latin American countries struggle with insufficient oxygen as Covid-19 continues to spread.

title: Reece James: Chelsea 'disgusted' after right-back is racially abused on social media
